issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
I installed activemq 5.9.0 as windows service under windows server 2008 r2 and use leveldb persistence. My coworker stopped the service and restarted it . Then I found that broker was running but no client could connect to it . I read the broker log file and found the following errors. I have no idea how to deal with this, thanks in advance for any help.

fields.summary: It seems that leveldb encounter some error and broker could not work normally
fields.environment: windows server 2008 r2 , NMS 1.6.0 , ActiveMQ 5.9.0 , persistence adapter as leveldb pure java implementation

comments.body: LevelDB is deprecated and no longer maintained.
